title: Data Analyst Intern – Product Performance
description: We’re looking for a hands-on data intern with strong business acumen and analytics background. If you’re comfortable working with structured data to generate product insights, this is the ideal role for you.
role:
Conduct sales trend and product performance analysis using Python (Pandas) and SQL

Design visual reports in Excel and Power BI

Apply forecasting and statistical hypothesis testing for new product launches

Present findings to stakeholders via interactive dashboards
mandatory_certifications:
Statistics for Data Science
Any data visualization certificate
